eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.text

Class HCPText

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.greenlightning.hypercubepdf.text.HCPText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HCPElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HCPMultilineText, HCPNormalText, HCPSideText

    public abstract class HCPText
extends Object
implements HCPElement
    Base class for text elements. The text is always painted in the center of the element.

    This class is immutable.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected HCPStyle style
      The style to use for painting.
      protected String text
      The text that this text element should paint.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Field Detail

      • text

        protected final String text
        The text that this text element should paint. May include line breaks. This field is never null.

      • style

        protected final HCPStyle style
        The style to use for painting. This field is never null.

      • withText

        public HCPText withText(String newText)
        Returns an HCPText instance that paints the specified text, but has all other properties in common with this instance. This method may return this instance if it already uses the specified text.
        Parameters:
        newText - not null
        Returns:
        an HCPText instance that paints the specified text

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • paint

        public final void paint(PDPageContentStream content,
                        PDRectangle shape)
                 throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: HCPElement
        Paints this element to the specified PDPageContentStream.

        Shape defines the position and size which should be used for painting. If the size is less than specified by HCPElement.getWidth() and HCPElement.getHeight() then this method does not guarantee that (a) the requested size is used or (b) the element is painted correctly or (c) the element is painted at all.

        Specified by:
        paint in interface HCPElement
        Parameters:
        content - not null
        shape - not null
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream

      • paintText

        protected abstract void paintText(PDPageContentStream content,
                                  float x,
                                  float y)
                           throws IOException
        Paints the text of this element at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        content - not null
        x - the x position to use
        y - the y position to use
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error writing to the stream
